materials.name: 3D porous coordination frameworks {[Ln(tci)·H2O]·4 H2O}n (Ln = Ce (1), Gd (2))

synthesis_conditions.temperature: below 100 8C for partially dehydrated phase 1a, above 150 8C for fully dehydrated compound
synthesis_conditions.atmosphere: air stable, Ar atmosphere for dehydration
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: The compound is stable up to about 300 8C, above which it decomposes.
